00034 struct clip
00035 {
00036 
00046     template <typename V, typename L, typename U, typename C>
00047     void operator () (V & ov, const V & nv, const within_bounds <
00048         L, U, boost::mpl::false_, boost::mpl::false_, C> & c) const
00049     {
00050         BOOST_ASSERT( !c.compare()(c.upper_bound(), c.lower_bound()) );
00051 
00052         if( c.is_below(nv) )
00053             ov = c.lower_bound();
00054         else if( c.is_above(nv) )
00055             ov = c.upper_bound();
00056         else
00057             BOOST_ASSERT(false);
00058     }
00059 
00060 };
00061 
00062 
00063 
00065 template <
00066     typename ValueType,
00067     typename LowerType = ValueType,
00068     typename UpperType = LowerType,
00069     typename CompareType = std::less<ValueType>
00070 >
00071 struct clipping
00072 {
00073 
00074     // To be able to clip to the bounds, both the bounds have to be included in the range.
00075 
00077     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00078         bounded<
00079             ValueType,
00080             LowerType,
00081             UpperType,
00082             clip,
00083             boost::mpl::false_,
00084             boost::mpl::false_,
00085             CompareType
00086         >::type type;
00087 
00088 };
00089 
00091 template <
00092     typename ValueType,
00093     ValueType LowerBound,
00094     ValueType UpperBound,
00095     typename CompareType = std::less<ValueType>
00096 >
00097 struct clipping_int

00102         clipping<
00103             ValueType,
00104             boost::mpl::integral_c<ValueType, LowerBound>,
00105             boost::mpl::integral_c<ValueType, UpperBound>,
00106             CompareType
00107         >::type type;
